constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 199 (Tuesday, November 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. FISCHBACH:
H.R. 5982.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1
[Page H6317]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

title: To make revisions in title 51, United States Code, as necessary to keep the title current, and to make technical amendments to improve the United States Code.
